   Joseph Kyrillos
   stated on July 11, 2012 in an interview on WNYC’s The Brian Lehrer Show:
   "We are not producing jobs.

So to support his claim that the "net of it all is that we lost jobs,"
   Kyrillos includes all of the job losses incurred during the recession.

Fay said the point Kyrillos was "making is that we still have lost a lot
   of jobs since the recession and are not replenishing them fast enough.

Our ruling

   Kyrillos said "we are not producing jobs.
